div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

ul.li:
Include ces codes sont définis dans 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.8.2.1
CodeDisplay
640pT0 [--]: No evidence of primary tumor
641pT1a [IA]: Tumor limited to one ovary; capsule intact, no tumor on ovarian surface. No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
642pT1b [IB]: Tumor limited to both ovaries; capsule intact, no tumor on ovarian surface. No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
643pT1c [IC]: Tumor limited to one or both ovaries with any of the following: capsule ruptured, tumor on ovarian surface, malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
644pT2a [IIA]: Extension and/or implants on uterus and/or tube(s). No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
645pT2b [IIB]: Extension to other pelvic tissues. No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
646pT2c [IIC]: Pelvic extension and/or implants (T2a or T2b / IIa or IIb) with malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
647pT3a [IIIA]: Microscopic peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis (no macroscopic tumor)
648pT3b [IIIB]: Macroscopic peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis <= 2 cm in greatest dimension
649pT3c [IIIC]: Peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis > 2 cm in greatest dimension and/or regional lymph node metastasis

publisher.value: Agence du Numérique en Santé(ANS) -2 - 10 Rue d'Oradour-sur-Glane, 75015 Paris

display.value: pT0 [--]: No evidence of primary tumor
pT1a [IA]: Tumor limited to one ovary; capsule intact, no tumor on ovarian surface. No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
pT1b [IB]: Tumor limited to both ovaries; capsule intact, no tumor on ovarian surface. No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
pT1c [IC]: Tumor limited to one or both ovaries with any of the following: capsule ruptured, tumor on ovarian surface, malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
pT2a [IIA]: Extension and/or implants on uterus and/or tube(s). No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
pT2b [IIB]: Extension to other pelvic tissues. No malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
pT2c [IIC]: Pelvic extension and/or implants (T2a or T2b / IIa or IIb) with malignant cells in ascites or peritoneal washings
pT3a [IIIA]: Microscopic peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis (no macroscopic tumor)
pT3b [IIIB]: Macroscopic peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis <= 2 cm in greatest dimension
pT3c [IIIC]: Peritoneal metastasis beyond pelvis > 2 cm in greatest dimension and/or regional lymph node metastasis
